resources.string: Mind is the single most important asset given to human being. But stresses and distractions have weakened its power to a great extent. Hence we want easy way out and don\'t want to use the mind much. Thinking has become toughest work today and hence this is the highest paid activity..

Speed reading course is an excellent way to control your mind. You will start with small and simple paragraphs and if your reading speed and comprehension is good or as it gets better, you will progressively move to the next level where your mind will be challenged more and more. This will not only increase your mind power but your concentration, will power, vocabulary and expression as well. Happy reading.... Press the next button now.
